meanings.definition: Epidemiologists: experts who study the spread and control of diseases
meanings.sent1: The epidemiologists analyzed how the flu spread in the community.
meanings.sent2: Many epidemiologists work tirelessly to understand how diseases affect different groups.
meanings.sent3: The epidemiologists joked that they were like disease detectives on a mission.
meanings.sent4: The role of epidemiologists is akin to uncovering hidden paths of illness in society.
meanings.sent5: In the movie, the epidemiologists were portrayed as heroes fighting against invisible enemies.

meanings.definition: Epidemiologists: those who investigate patterns and causes of diseases in populations
meanings.sent1: Epidemiologists use data to find out why certain diseases are more common in specific areas.
meanings.sent2: The team of epidemiologists discovered a new pattern in the outbreak of the virus.
meanings.sent3: During the conference, the epidemiologists shared intriguing findings about disease origins.
meanings.sent4: The work of epidemiologists is like solving a complex puzzle of illness triggers.
meanings.sent5: The image of epidemiologists poring over maps of disease hotspots is unforgettable.
